data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module CGI::Widget::Tabs generates tab widgets in HTML.
    Example: ____________ _______ _______________ / Lease Cars \ / Xerox
    \ / Coffee makers \
    --------------------------------------------------------

    It's sole execution domain is Perl CGI scripting. Currenly there is
    no other module with similar functionality.
